name: Jelly Reef
description:
You are the ocean. Touch the sea with your fingers and guide jellyfish through a roguelike underwater world.
You chart a path to the depths of the ocean, trying to keep your jellyfish together and survive all the dangers ahead. Each level connects to another, but there is no easy way to reach the end. Change the direction of the sea currents and lead the jellyfish to safety.

Features:

• Control the flow of the ocean!
• Procedurally generated levels – your journey will be unique each time.
• Beautiful, colorful environments teeming with creatures and corals.
• Map out your adventure and reach the bottom of the sea.
